title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 182-1.19 - Abuse, neglect and significant incidents
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 182-1.19 - Abuse, neglect and significant incidents

State Regulations

Runaway and homeless youth residential facilities shall be
subject to and must comply with the requirements as set forth in 18 NYCRR Part
433
and any other applicable regulations including, but not limited to, 14
NYCRR Parts
703
-
704. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
§§
182-1.19

Amended

New

York State Register December 23, 2015/Volume XXXVII, Issue 51, eff. 12/23/2015

Amended

New

York State Register March 28, 2018/Volume XL, Issue 13, eff. 3/28/2018

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
